statements: DELETE FROM employee_time_records WHERE employee_id = 101 AND attendance_date = '2022-01-10';

DELETE FROM employee_time_records WHERE clock_out_time < '12:00:00' AND hours_worked > 8.00;
DELETE FROM employees WHERE department_id = 1 AND hire_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM time_records WHERE employee_id = 100 AND clock_in < '2021-08-15';
DELETE FROM AttendanceRecord WHERE record_date = '2022-01-01' AND employee_id = 100;

DELETE FROM time_attendance_records WHERE employee_id = 101 AND check_in < '09:00:00';
DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE record_date < '2022-01-01' AND compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
